name: Snow Truck Rally
description:
You like playing racing game, sports cars game, have you ever tried truck rally game ??
Just play this game of truck rally, racing highway, this must be more exciting and relaxing
Rally, racing your truck on fantastic snowy environment
Rally, racing your your truck auto around nice snowy environment with high speed. More thrilling, excited feeling.
This is very basic of racing , rally game of truck games
Features:
- Amazing graphics of truck, nice fantastic snowy environment
- Simple controls to control and drive your truck
- Gas, brake buttons to control your racing , rally truck
- Automatic gear of your racing , rally truck
- Swing your device to control your truck steer
- Camera button to change your view of racing, rally truck
